title.value: The effect of somatic cell count on the mineral composition of milk
Степень влияния уровня соматических клеток на минеральный состав молока

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Drugakova, V.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article evaluates the effect of somatic cell count on the mineral composition of milk. The obtained results have shown that high somatic cell count exceeding the physiological standard in milk of healthy cows leads to a decrease of major elements (K, Ca, P, Mg) and an increase of chlorine and sodium concentration. It should also be noted that the content of such trace elements as zink and iron in cow's milk of all groups under test appears to rise steadily
